title: Check EBT Card Balance
description: A SNAP recipient wants to check the current balance on their EBT card.

tasks.description: Identify and authenticate the benefits recipient using their card number and PIN or personal information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent securely verifies the caller's identity.

tasks.description: Retrieve the current balance from the EBT system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully finds the current balance on the card.

tasks.description: Inform the citizen of their current balance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the balance amount.
